00001 #ifndef QUATERNIONS_H
00002 #define QUATERNIONS_H

00038 #include <complex>
00039 #include <iostream>
00040 using namespace std;
00041 
00043 typedef double R;
00045 typedef complex<double> C;
00046 
00048 
00056 class H {
00057 private:
00058   R a,b,c,d;
00059 
00060 public:
00062 
00071   H(R aa = 0., R bb = 0., R cc = 0., R dd = 0.) { 
00072     a = aa; b = bb; c = cc; d = dd; 
00073   }
00074 
00076 
00083   H(C z) { 
00084     a = z.real();
00085     b = z.imag();
00086     c = d = 0.;
00087   }
00088 
00089   // GET METHODS
00094   R getA() const { return a; }
00095 
00100   R getB() const { return b; }
00101 
00106   R getC() const { return c; }
00107 
00112   R getD() const { return d; }
00113 
00114 
00115   // BASIC ARITHMETIC
00116 
00122   H operator+(const H& that) const {
00123       return H(a + that.a, b+that.b, c+that.c, d+that.d);
00124   }
00125 
00130   H operator-() const {
00131     return H(-a,-b,-c,-d);
00132   }
00133 
00139   H operator-(const H& that) const {
00140     return (*this) + (-that);
00141   }
00142 
00148   H operator*(const H& that) const {
00149     R aa = a*that.a - b*that.b - c*that.c - d*that.d;
00150     R bb = b*that.a + a*that.b - d*that.c + c*that.d;
00151     R cc = c*that.a + a*that.c + d*that.b - b*that.d;
00152     R dd = b*that.c - c*that.b + d*that.a + a*that.d;
00153     return H(aa,bb,cc,dd);
00154   }
00155 
00172   R norm() const {
00173     return a*a + b*b + c*c + d*d;
00174   }
00175 
00180   H conjugate() const {
00181     return H(a,-b,-c,-d);
00182   }
00183 
00188   H inverse() const  {
00189     R n = norm();
00190     return H(a/n, -b/n, -c/n, -d/n);
00191   }
00192 
00193 
00200   H operator/(const H& that) const {
00201     return (*this) * (that.inverse());
00202   }
00203 
00204   // OPERATORS COMBINED WITH ASSIGN
00205   
00207   H operator+=(const H& that) {
00208     *this = *this + that;
00209     return *this;
00210   }
00211 
00213   H operator-=(const H& that) {
00214     *this = *this - that;
00215     return *this;
00216   }
00217 
00219   H operator*=(const H& that) {
00220     *this = (*this) * that;
00221     return *this;
00222   }
00223 
00225   H operator/=(const H& that) {
00226     *this = (*this)/that;
00227     return *this;
00228   }
00229 
00230   // COMPARISON OPERATORS
00232   bool operator==(const H& that) const {
00233     return (a==that.a) && (b==that.b) && (c==that.c) && (d==that.d);
00234   }
00235 
00237   bool operator!=(const H& that) const {
00238     return !((*this) == that);
00239   }
00240   
00247   bool operator<(const H& that) const {
00248     if (a < that.a) return true;
00249     if (a > that.a) return false;
00250     if (b < that.b) return true;
00251     if (b > that.b) return false;
00252     if (c < that.c) return true;
00253     if (c > that.c) return false;
00254     if (d < that.d) return true;
00255     return false;
00256   }
00257 
00258 };
